category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_Enable_Implicit_CO
preference.preference_description: Specifies if a user can edit an object without explicitly checking out an object. Allows different users to simultaneously edit the same object. In such a concurrent editing scenario, when saving the changes, if changes by another user have already been committed, then the TC_overwrite_protection,preference determines if the changes by the current user should overwrite the other user's changes or if the current user must redo the changes. Valid Values: True - Enables users to edit an object without using the Check-out menu. False - Enables users to edit an object by clicking Check-Out and Edit.
